outputs.output_descr:
To enable the Government of Yemen to effectively deliver poverty reduction and reform commitments (including the Development Plan and Poverty Reduction, National Reform Agenda and the Paris Declaration). The support covers 2 main areas:
1. Addressing short term functionality in planning, aid coordination and policy development. 
2. Aiding in longer term organizational change to improve capacity within the Ministry of Planning.

project_descr: Provision of advisory services to Ministry of Planning and International Cooperation
project_title: Advisory Support to Minsitry of Planning

subnational.name: Ministry of Planning and International Cooperation
